chat.title: PE investigations
chat.message:
1. What does history check mean? Is there a reason we have three different items to equal a group and screen? Can these be linked items if we have to keep them as three items?
  2. Unclear why CK is on here
  3. Unclear why there are two entries for troponin and two for BNP -- also isn't it all NT-proBNP now?
  4. We are missing TTE - unclear why only TEE is on here
  5. Are we assuming a CT chest was already done? Can we include CT chest PE protocol in here?
